action.action-desc: Ms. Pettersen (for herself and Mr. Nunn of Iowa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize grants for building communities of recovery.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Communities of Recovery Reauthorization Act of 2025.

Section 547(f) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 290eeâ€“2(f)) is amended by striking $5,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting $17,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 through 2030.
